content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You receive your salary on the 4th working day of the next month following the month of cooperation. The card can be issued by any Armenian bank that you choose.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can find more information on the dedicated \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/AMCompensation\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compensation page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or go to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://policy.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"policy.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" > Compensation and Benefits.1\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case of any questions or issues, drop an email to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:wfaanywheresalary@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Anywhere Salary\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Please note that the answer might require five business days.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
